name: GreetingSlack
description: This app connects to your slack channel and greets new joiners with a custom msg

SLACK-CHANNELS.description: The Slack Channels for this Bot to Greet New Joiners
SLACK-CHANNELS.value: A comma-delimited list of Slack Channel Ids

UNFURL-LINKS.description: We UNFURL only the last link by default, trust me its good

WELCOME-MESSAGE.value: A personalized welcome msg that is broadcasted to your Slack Users
